action.action-desc: Mr. Filner introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to reduce the period of time for which a veteran must be totally disabled before the veteran’s survivors are eligible for the benefits provided by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs for survivors of certain veterans rated totally disabled at time of death.

section.header: Reduction of period of time for which veterans must be totally disabled for purposes of benefits provided by Secretary of Veterans Affairs for survivors of certain veterans rated totally disabled at time of death

subsection.text: Section 1318(b) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking if— and all that follows through the period at the end and inserting the following: if the disability was continuously rated totally disabling for a period of not less than one year immediately preceding death..
The amendment made by subsection (a) shall apply with respect to deaths occurring on or after the date of the enactment of this Act.
